panels.description:
All instances among etcd cluster ${cls}

Instance: Goto PGSQL Instance

IP: Goto PGSQL Node

Status: Goto PGSQL Service

Load: max(cpu,postgres,pgbouncer)

Space: Disk space usage max(all device)

Proxy: session number, Goto Haproxy Admin Page
panels.title: ETCD Member List

targets.expr:
sum(up{job="etcd", cls="$cls"}) by (cls) /
 count(up{job="etcd", cls="$cls"}) by (cls)
or on() vector(0)

panels.description: Alerting event graph. Each stripe represent an alerting Event. Gray transparent stipe are pending alerts.
